item.description:
As a group, we haven't attended a Japanese movie since June and haven't gone to the ICA since at least August. The ICA doesn't host films as frequently as the MFA, which is a shame for us because it's an absolutely beautiful facility.

U.S. Premiere! Includes Indigo Road by Tomoyasu Murata, Scrap Land by Dino Sato, Bio City by Yoshihisa Nakanishi, Tough Guy by Shinatro Kishimoto, desktop by Yoshinao Satoh, and more.

I will provide more information about the shorts and their directors if I find out anything.

Afterwards, I (Nicole) will be holding up a meetup sign and we'll head off to the museum cafe, where we will eat concoctions supposedly come up with by Wolfgang Puck, catch a beautiful view of the water and discuss what we saw.
item.name: New Independent Animation from Japan: Animated Short Films
